#include <iostream>
#include <map>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
        string tmp;
        int i, n;
        map<string,int> m;

        cin >> n;
        int k = 1;
        for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
                cin >> tmp;
                m[tmp]++;
                if (m[tmp] == k){
                        cout << k <<" ";
                        cout << tmp<<endl;
                        k++;
                }
        }
        return 0;
}
